price: Sen ve kardeşin âyetlerimle gidin. Beni anmakta gevşeklik göstermeyin.
arabic: ٱذۡهَبۡ أَنتَ وَأَخُوكَ بِـَٔايَٰتِي وَلَا تَنِيَا فِي ذِكۡرِي

version.title: Turkish translation - Rowwad Tanslation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: idh'hab anta wa-akhūka biāyātī walā taniyā fī dhik'rī
